CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 23, reads: "Proper Shade - Miss Juanita Mitchner, right, of Carmen Murphy's House of Beauty Cosmetics of Detroit selects the proper shades of beauty products for an interested homemaker as Business Manager Floyd Carver and Mrs. Agnes Dixon, one of the Pittsburgh representatives, prepare for a demonstration."
TitMainTitle: Three women, including one wearing light colored smock, examining another's hand, in Carmen Murphy's House of Beauty Cosmetics booth in Ammon Center for the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
